sub_title: Life long, active and experiential learning: purpose, passion, play; collaboration is key #EarthCharter
summary:
My purpose lies in working towards a just, sustainable, peaceful and ethical society and planetary wellbeing. I work towards this vision by developing materials and models that create awareness of the effects of the Anthropocene and inspire people and communities to implement regenerative sustainable solutions based on circularity. Every day new solutions are offered to transform our current society into one that respects and cares for the community of life. Therefor I keep on studying innovations and implementations of techniques and climate change policies.

Communication and education have always been key in my professional career. Some of the organizations I’ve worked with include World of Walas, Earth Charter International, Umista Cultural Centre, Helicon Opleidingen, Marine Mammal Park Dolfinarium Harderwijk and schools/colleges.

I love working with a team to create great projects and products, building international networks, inspire people to learn more.

For the Earth Charter Center at the University for Peace in Costa Rica I am working on (educational) programmes and the international EC community as well as creating new partnerships to work towards an even bigger community. 
Back in the Netherlands I got the opportunity to teach and coach again for Helicon Opleidingen Geldermalsen. For this organisation I also manage Education Innovations. Currently I work for Aeres in teaching and developing the curriculum for a new programme on sustainable development.
For World of Walas, I had an advising role for projects concerning social economic and sustainable development. Projects in which neighbourhoods are revitalised to a dynamic and sustainable part of the city filled with activities, creativity and wellbeing.

Skills: writing and editorship, cultural anthropology, creative economy and sustainable urbanisation, organisational skills, communication and educational skills, (educational) program and material development, leading a winning team, public speaking.

treasury_media.title: Earth Charter Poster
treasury_media.description: An overview of the principles of the Earth Charter helps as a reminder to put conscience into action.

treasury_media.title: The Earth Charter
treasury_media.description:
Moral leadership starts with each and everyone of us. I use the Earth Charter as my ethical compass. The Earth Charter is a document with sixteen principles  that turn conscience into action.
It seeks to inspire in all people a new sense of global interdependence and shared responsibility for the well-being of the whole human family, the greater community of life, and future generations. It is a vision of hope and a call to action.

organizations.name: Green Chamber of Commerce BC Canada

projects.title: Dudoc Vancouver
projects.description:
As of august 2014 I am the general manager of Dudoc Vancouver. Dudoc is a platform for sustainable Dutch companies to promote their business cases for sustainable development in down town Vancouver. Dudoc provides an opportunity for exceptional Dutch innovators to introduce their advanced environmental designs and products to the Canadian public. As such, it bridges the gap European expert knowledge and the Canadian consumers.
Our goal is to achieve a low carbon economy and resolve environmental challenges through international partnerships and cutting-edge solutions.
Located in downtown Vancouver, at the centre of its urban agglomeration, Dudoc brings together creative minds in order to reduce the environmental impact of urban and rural communities in an integrated manner.

profile_positions.description: Ayñiy focuses on environmental value education and advise, helping organizations to take steps towards sustainability and circularity based on the interdependence of all life. Ayñiy works with themes such as climate change, biodiversity, sustainable lifestyles, and resource wisdom.
profile_positions.title: Founder of Ayniy; towards planetary wellbeing

profile_positions.description: Aeres MBO Ede biedt dé mbo-opleidingen op gebied van duurzaamheid in voeding en leefomgeving.
profile_positions.title: Education Professional

profile_positions.description: The passion for animal welfare (both human and other animals) of AnimalConcepts director Sabrina Brando made me want to be part of this amazing organization. As an educator I believe in Nelson Mandela's phrase 'Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world'. AnimalConcepts is working with the same attitude to improve the life of animals and the people that take care of them. In collaboration we can achieve much more, so let's go to work. Birds of a feather flock together. I love collaborating with AnimalConcepts to contribute to increasing the animal care and welfare and the wellbeing of people that take care of them.
profile_positions.title: Partner of AnimalConcepts

profile_positions.description: The ECI Secretariat, which is based at the United Nations-mandated University for Peace in Costa Rica, endeavours to promote the mission, vision, strategies and policies adopted by the ECI Council. The Secretariat guides and liaises with efforts to bring the Earth Charter to the fields of education, youth, business and religion. It manages communications with the larger Earth Charter network, and promotes the use of the Earth Charter as an international soft law document.
profile_positions.title: Programme and Partnership Development

profile_positions.description: Yuverta MBO Geldermalsen is als sfeervolle, overzichtelijk en moderne school een fijne plek om te leren. Vanuit samenwerken met en in de regio, wordt leren en werken gecombineerd. Het is een prettige, kleinschalige school waar werken en leren samenkomen. Samen met ongeveer 400 andere leerlingen ontwikkel je hier je eigen talenten in een open, relaxte sfeer. Helicon MBO Geldermalsen is in 2014 grondig verbouwd en dat zie je direct terug. Bistrotafels in de aula, een open leercentrum met ruime werkplekken en frisse leslokalen. In het sciencelab staat de nieuwste apparatuur voor testen en onderzoeken. En de eco-tuin is ontworpen door onze leerlingen. Hier vind je dierenverblijven, maar ook een teeltstellage met weerstation en een klimwand. Stralend middelpunt is de prachtige treurwilg, een gewilde plek om te studeren of te relaxen.
profile_positions.title: Professional Educator

profile_positions.description: World of Walas believes that cities start with people. With new ideas for old buildings and sound business practice, Walas creates places where people want to live, work, produce and participate. Finding that balance in ways that are economically, environmentally and socially sustainable is a unique challenge every time. Walas engages in all aspects of urban development and redevelopment including concept and design, development and construction, project management, property management and access to innovations.
profile_positions.title: Cofounder&Education Advisor, Previous Programme and Partnership Development

profile_positions.description:
Walas is op veel fronten, die betrekking hebben op stadsontwikkeling, actief. Daarin gaat het om de mensen, om de community, en niet zo zeer om de gebouwen. Op dit moment zijn we hard aan het werk in o.a. Heerlen, Tilburg, Vaals, Ede, Steenwijk, San Francisco en Vancouver. Vanaf augustus 2014 zal ik  vanuit Vancouver als General Manager werken aan de Canadese Walas Concepts Inc projecten.

Voor Earth Charter heeft Walas het Earth Charter Cities Manifesto mogen schrijven welke voor het eerst werd gepresenteerd op 27 juni 2010 in het Vredespaleis te Den Haag. Inmiddels is het manifest gelanceerd op diverse spraakmakende congressen over de hele wereld. Vele steden, groot en klein, uit alle continenten, hebben van hun belangstelling doen blijken.

World of Walas hanteert het Earth Charter als een ethische leidraad voor onze ontwikkelingen en projecten. Dat is allesbehalve een handicap. Met een andere focus kan in elk project tegen nauwelijks toename van kosten een grote mate van technische en sociaal-economische duurzaamheid worden bereikt. Veel mensen en bedrijven sluiten zich er graag bij aan.
profile_positions.title: Projects & Communication

Head editor and author for magazines about relationship between people and the natural environment.

(experience economy and hospitality)

profile_positions.title: Educational Director

profile_positions.description:
Helicon MBO Apeldoorn is een kleine actieve school, gelegen op een unieke locatie aan de Loolaan in Apeldoorn. In het karakteristieke pand verzorgt een enthousiast team van ongeveer 40 medewerkers groene-opleidingen voor ruim 400 leerlingen. Van oudsher is Helicon MBO Apeldoorn specialist in het verzorgen van praktijkgericht onderwijs gericht op bos- en natuurbeheer, boomverzorging (European Treeworker) en de groene ruimte. De laatste jaren is het opleidingsaanbod verbreed om ook vakbekwame mensen op te leiden die kennis van en liefde voor natuur combineren met werken met mensen of dieren. Bijvoorbeeld Wellness & Lifestyle, Outdoor & Adventure, Medewerker Maatschappelijke Zorg Natuur & Welzijn, Eco & Wildlife en onze dier-opleidingen Dier, Gedrag & Ondernemen en Dierverzorging.

Helicon, through their educations in Eco & Wildlife Studies, Outdoor and Adventure and Forest and Nature Conservation teaches their students about natural habitats in the Netherlands, Europe and other continents. Animals in their natural environment and animal behavior, changing landscapes, survival techniques, techniques in professionally handling tools, tourism and education, basic anthropology, marketing and communication, organizing (outdoor) activities are all topics students will become experts in during their three years of college.
profile_positions.title: Docent, coach, onderwijs ontwikkelaar, opleidingscoordinator

profile_positions.description:
The Green Chamber of Commerce BC (GCCBC) is a not-for-profit provincial organization that was founded in February 2012. The GCCBC provides a home for businesses who do not belong to a traditional organization. Through education, networking events, peer-to-peer consultation, and advocacy for green policies, we will unite all sustainable minded professionals and businesses in one place.
By bridging the gap between businesses and a green sustainable economy, we support  and advocate for the Triple Bottom Line – People, Planet, and Profit.

MISSION:
Growing a sustainable economy that embraces people, planet and profit in British Columbia.

VISION:
To support all businesses in British Columbia to engage in a sustainable economy.
profile_positions.title: Member Board of Directors

profile_positions.description:
After working as a manager in communication, educational and cultural programs and innovation in experience and creative economy I went back to teaching and loved it. Working with students, giving them tools to help making good decisions, showing them what their opportunities are with the right knowledge and especially the right attitude is a great challenge, a lot of fun and worth all the energy.

Helicon, through their educations in Eco & Wildlife Studies, Outdoor and Adventure and Forest and Nature Conservation teaches their students about natural habitats in the Netherlands, Europe and other continents. Animals in their natural environment and animal behavior, changing landscapes, survival techniques, techniques in professionally handling tools, tourism and education, basic anthropology, marketing and communication, organizing (outdoor) activities are all topics students will become experts in during their four years of college.
profile_positions.title: Teacher, coach & development Eco & Wildlife studies

profile_positions.description: De Wereldschool verzorgt het afstandsonderwijs voor Nederlandstalige kinderen die in het buiten­land verblijven. Ik schrijf momenteel instructies voor het vak biologie in het voortgezet onderwijs en ben E-docent biologie.
profile_positions.title: Author & teacher

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Green Chamber of Commerce BC (GCCBC) is a not-for-profit provincial organization that was founded in February 2012.  We are currently endorsed by the Mechanical Contractors Association of BC (MCABC) and are modelled after the United States’ and San Francisco Bay Area based Green Chamber of Commerce.
The GCCBC provides a home for businesses who do not belong to a traditional organization.  Through education, networking events, peer-to-peer consultation, and advocacy for green policies, we will unite all sustainable minded professionals and businesses in one place.
By bridging the gap between businesses and a green sustainable economy, we support  and advocate for the Triple Bottom Line – People, Planet, and Profit.

MISSION:
Growing a sustainable economy that embraces people, planet and profit in British Columbia.

VISION:
To support all businesses in British Columbia to engage in a sustainable economy.

The passion for animal welfare (both human and other animals) of AnimalConcepts director Sabrina Brando made me want to be part of this amazing organization. As an educator I believe in Nelson Mandela's phrase 'Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world'. AnimalConcepts is working with the same attitude to improve the life of animals and the people that take care of them. In collaboration we can achieve much more, so let's go to work. Birds of a feather flock together. I love collaborating with AnimalConcepts to contribute to increasing the animal care and welfare and the wellbeing of people that take care of them.
